name: Invaders from Inner Space
description:
IT IS STRONGLY RECOMMENDED TO PLAY THIS GAME WITH A COMPUTER MOUSE

A benevolent celestial giant that protects your home planet has an unending illness that you have been tasked to curb!

It's a suicide mission but you die knowing you helped prolong the life of your world's guardian...

Made in 72 hours for a space game jam with some friends!

HOW TO PLAY:

[Mouse] to aim

[Left mouse button] to Shoot,

[Right mouse button] to Punch (destroys enemy bullets)

[E] to Interact

[Spacebar] to Dash (you are invulnerable while dashing)

Collect upgrades and move through as many levels as possible before you succumb to your enemies (or boredom)
